entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , St. Thomas
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:49 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -12.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 8:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -12.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: WSW 33 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 6:25 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
